content: mini jumper these tiny sweaters knit up super quick and are the perfect size to hang on your christmas tree as a ornament attach to a gift card for a quick teacher appreciation present or clip to a garland to hang on a mantle this project is a great way to use up leftover scraps of yarn sizes one size measurements approximately 6 w x 3 l gauge n/a needle size us 6 4mm dpns yarn/yardage dk weight- sandnes garn peer gynt 25yds / 23m / 12g notions 5 stitch markers yarn needle scissors measuring tape all measurements and yardages are approximations and are rounded written instructions in american knitting terms feel free to sell any items made from this pattern in small quantities no wholesale orders and please give credit to my shop fibers and pines please do not sell copy or give my pattern away if you have any questions at any time please email me at hello@fibersandpines com and i will respond as quickly as i can no returns or refunds can be accepted instagram @fibersandpines pinterest fibersandpines youtube fibersandpines thanks and happy knitting © 2025 fibers and pines all rights reserved
